name: Detective 1sense
description:
One killer...

Only one sense to catch him...

Only one try...

Be careful not to accuse an innocent villager! You only have one try. Some villagers won't provide information unless you greet them, but be careful, if you greet the killer, you will lose.

Put yourself in the boots of a fallen police officer now known as Detective 1sense, with only one sense active at any time because of [REDACTED].

Good luck!
